events.justification:
Night 1. Time to start thinning the herd. Agent5 seems like a good choice. They haven't done anything yet, so they could be anyone, and eliminating them now is a good way to sow some early confusion.

VOTE: Agent5

events.content:
Agent5 was killed last night. That's a tough start. Agent5 seemed pretty quiet, so it's hard to get a read on them from what little we know. We need to be careful not to make hasty accusations. I'll be listening closely to everyone's reasoning today.

VOTE: NOONE

Agent5's death last night is a worrying start. It could mean the werewolf is aggressive, or perhaps just unlucky with who they targeted. I'm going to listen closely to what everyone else has to say to try and piece together any suspicious behavior.

VOTE: NOONE

Okay, Agent5 is dead. That's unfortunate. We lost someone on Night 1, so the werewolf is already active and confident. It's still too early to really point fingers, but I'm going to be listening very carefully to what everyone else says. I want to see if anyone tries to deflect suspicion too quickly, or if anyone is unusually quiet.

VOTE: NOONE

Agent5 was killed last night. That's a shame, they were a good player. I'm trying to figure out what happened. Agent7, Agent1, Agent3, Agent6, Agent0, Agent2, does anyone have any suspicions? I don't have enough information to make a strong accusation yet.

VOTE: NOONE

Agent5 is dead. That's unfortunate. It's hard to say who did it, as it's still so early. I haven't seen any suspicious behavior from anyone yet, but we need to be vigilant. I'll be watching everyone closely today.

VOTE: Agent7

Agent5 was killed on Night 1. That's a strong indicator that we might have a werewolf among us. I'm trying to piece things together. Agent7, you were awfully quiet last night. Anything to report? Agent1, what are your thoughts on the situation? Agent3, you seem to be observing a lot, have you noticed anything suspicious? Agent4, Agent6, Agent2, I'd like to hear from all of you. Let's try to make an informed decision here.

VOTE: Agent7

Agent5's death is a tough start. We lost one of our own on the first night. This means the werewolf is already active and isn't afraid to strike. We need to be very careful about who we trust. I'm not sure what to make of anyone yet, as no one has spoken. I'm going to hold off on any accusations for now and see what everyone else says.

VOTE: NOONE

events.justification:
It seems like no one is willing to make a decision yet, which is understandable given how early it is. Agent7 and Agent0 both seemed to be focusing on each other a bit, but without any real evidence. Agent4 also mentioned they don't have enough information. I still think Agent7 is a reasonable target to remove for now. They were vocally quiet last night and then tried to direct attention elsewhere without much to go on.

VOTE: Agent7

events.content:
Agent7 was killed last night. This is concerning. Agent5 was killed on Night 1, and now Agent7. It seems the werewolf is not afraid to be aggressive. Agent6 voted for Agent7 yesterday, and Agent0 also seemed to be targeting Agent7. That's suspicious to me. Agent6, why did you vote for Agent7? Agent0, you also seemed to be putting Agent7 on the spot.

VOTE: Agent6

Agent7 is dead. This is concerning, they were actively trying to get information and didn't make any strong accusations, which I thought was a reasonable approach for the first day. Agent6 voted for Agent7 on day 1, and Agent0 also voted for Agent7. Now Agent7 is dead. It's highly suspicious that someone Agent6 and Agent0 targeted is now dead. I'm leaning towards one of them being the werewolf. Agent6's vote for Agent7 on day 1 without much justification stood out to me.

VOTE: Agent6

Agent7 is dead. This is concerning. Two nights in a row, a villager has been killed. Agent6 and Agent0 both voted for Agent7 on the first day, which now looks suspicious given Agent7 was killed last night. It's hard to say if that was a genuine suspicion or an attempt to frame someone. Agent0 also directly questioned Agent7's quietness, which is odd now. Agent6's immediate vote for Agent7 also raises an eyebrow.

VOTE: Agent6

Well, this is getting interesting. Agent5 killed Night 1, and now Agent7 is gone Night 2. This is a pretty quick elimination rate, so the werewolf is definitely active. Agent6, you voted for Agent7 yesterday. What made you suspect them so strongly? Agent1, Agent3, Agent4, Agent2, and Agent6, we're down to six. We really need to make a solid choice today to avoid losing another person.

VOTE: Agent6

Well, Agent7 is dead now too. That's two nights, two villagers gone. This is getting serious. Agent7 was quiet in the first round, but then Agent6 voted for them, and Agent0 also pointed suspicion at them. Now Agent7 is dead. This makes me suspicious of Agent6 and Agent0. Agent0 was actively trying to get people to talk, which can be good, but also a way to probe for information or create chaos. Agent6's early vote for Agent7 felt a bit out of nowhere given the limited information.

VOTE: Agent6

Agent7 is dead. Last night's vote to eliminate Agent7 was pretty split, and it didn't end up happening. Now Agent7 is gone anyway. This is concerning because it means someone is willing to take direct action, and it wasn't voted on. Agent0 and I were the only ones who voted for Agent7, and Agent0 seemed to be questioning a lot of people. I'm going to try and keep the focus off myself and see what Agent0 does. Agent4 hasn't really taken a strong stance, which is a bit unusual.

VOTE: Agent0
